Name: Miyabi Morimoto 600S Edition 9-Inch Chef's Knife
contro:
Expensive
  • Blade's fine edge makes it unsuited for cutting hard foods
pro:
Food professionals and consumer testers found it comfortable to hold and easy to use
  • Excellent at slicing and chopping onions, and slicing steak, tomatoes, and cheddar
  • Remained sharp after extended use in GHRI tests
